trans-unit.source: Defines the underlying structure of all code access permissions.
trans-unit.target: 定義所有程式碼存取權限的基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: Code access permissions use a stack walk to ensure that all callers of the code have been granted a permission.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼存取權限會使用堆疊查核行程，確認所有呼叫端程式碼的已被授與權限。

trans-unit.source: If a permission object is `null`, it is handled the same as a permission object with the state <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 權限物件是否`null`，就會處理與狀態的權限物件與相同<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫堆疊通常會表示向下成長，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫的方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。

trans-unit.source: Inheritors of the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> class must be granted full trust to function correctly as permissions extending the security infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 繼承者<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>類別必須被授與完全信任才能正確運作，做為安全性基礎結構延伸權限。

trans-unit.source: To determine that the inheritors are fully trusted, <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> issues an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand> for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence> = `true` and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy> = `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否完全信任，所以繼承者<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>問題<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand>如<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence> = `true`和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy> = `true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a permission derived from the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範衍生自的權限<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: for the ability of inheritors to provide evidence and view and modify policy.
trans-unit.target: 繼承者提供的辨識項，並檢視和修改原則的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />, you must also implement the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />，您也必須實作<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission" />介面。

trans-unit.source: The following <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> members must be overridden: <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy" />, <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect(System.Security.IPermission)" />, <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.IsSubsetOf(System.Security.IPermission)" />, <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.ToXml" />, <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.FromXml(System.Security.SecurityElement)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union(System.Security.IPermission)" />.
trans-unit.target: 下列<see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />必須覆寫成員： <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy" />， <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect(System.Security.IPermission)" />， <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.IsSubsetOf(System.Security.IPermission)" />， <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.ToXml" />， <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.FromXml(System.Security.SecurityElement)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union(System.Security.IPermission)" />。

trans-unit.source: You must also define a constructor that takes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> as its only parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須定義的建構函式<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />做為其唯一參數。

trans-unit.source: You must apply the <see cref="T:System.SerializableAttribute" /> attribute to a class that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先套用<see cref="T:System.SerializableAttribute" />屬性繼承自一個類別<see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called to initialize state in the type whenever an instance of the derived class is created.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化型別中的狀態，每次建立衍生類別的執行個體時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Although you can explicitly call this constructor in the constructor declaration of the derived class constructor, this is not usually necessary; most compilers will automatically generate the call for you.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以明確呼叫這個建構函式，在衍生的類別建構函式的建構函式宣告中，這通常不需要。大多數的編譯器會自動產生的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Declares that the calling code can access the resource protected by a permission demand through the code that calls this method, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource.
trans-unit.target: 宣告即使堆疊中較高層的呼叫端未獲得資源存取權限，呼叫程式碼仍可透過呼叫這個方法的程式碼要求權限，來存取受保護的資源。

trans-unit.source: Using <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" /> can create security issues.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" /> 可能會造成安全性問題。

trans-unit.source: The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫堆疊通常會表示向下成長，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫的方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> prevents a stack walk originating lower in the call stack from proceeding up the call stack beyond the code that calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>防止來自較低位置之外的程式碼會呼叫這個方法的呼叫堆疊向上繼續進行的呼叫堆疊中的堆疊查核行程。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, even if callers higher on the call stack do not have the requisite permissions to access a resource, they can still access it through the code that calls this method on the necessary permission.
trans-unit.target: 因此，即使在呼叫堆疊中較高的呼叫端沒有必要的使用權限來存取資源，他們還是可以存取它透過呼叫這個方法所需的權限的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: An assertion is effective only if the code that calls <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> passes the security check for the permission that it is asserting.
trans-unit.target: 判斷提示是有效的程式碼呼叫時，才<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>通過安全性檢查，它會判斷提示之權限。

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> is effective until the calling code returns to its caller.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>呼叫程式碼會傳回其呼叫端才會生效。

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> can be active on a frame.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>作用中的框架。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> when an active <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> exists on the frame results in a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>時作用中<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>上的框架會導致有<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAssert%2A> or <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A> to remove an active <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAssert%2A>或<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A>移除作用中<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> 會忽略該權限的要求將會失敗，因為未授與的權限。

trans-unit.source: However, if code lower on the call stack calls <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> for that permission, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果在呼叫堆疊中較低的程式碼呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>該權限，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>堆疊查核行程到達嘗試呼叫的程式碼時，會擲回<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This happens because the code that called <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> has not been granted the permission, even though it tried to <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> it.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為程式碼呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>未被授與權限，即使應用程式嘗試<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>它。

trans-unit.source: Because calling <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> removes the requirement that all code in the call chain must be granted permission to access the specified resource, it can open up security issues if used incorrectly or inappropriately.
trans-unit.target: 因為呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>移除所有程式碼呼叫鏈結中的需求必須被授與權限可以存取指定的資源，如果使用不正確或不當，它可以開啟安全性的問題。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it should be used with great caution.
trans-unit.target: 因此，應該使用小心謹慎。

trans-unit.source: The calling code does not have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Assertion" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的程式碼沒有 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Assertion" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is already an active <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" /> for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 目前的框架已有作用中的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫的功能<see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Assertion" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Assertion" />

trans-unit.source: You cannot override this method.
trans-unit.target: 您無法覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a derived class, creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別實作時，建立並傳回目前權限物件的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 目前權限物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object.
trans-unit.target: 權限物件的複本以原始的權限物件的資源表示相同的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an override of the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的覆寫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: Forces a <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityException" /> at run time if all callers higher in the call stack have not been granted the permission specified by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫堆疊中較高的所有呼叫端都尚未被授與由目前執行個體所指定之權限，則會在執行階段強制執行 <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityException" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used by secure libraries to ensure that callers have permission to access a resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常可由安全程式庫來確定呼叫端擁有存取資源的權限。

trans-unit.source: For example, a file class in a secure class library calls <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> for the necessary <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> before performing a file operation requested by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 例如，檔案中的類別安全類別庫的呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>必要的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>之前執行檔案作業的呼叫端要求。

trans-unit.source: The permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack.
trans-unit.target: 不會檢查呼叫這個方法的程式碼的權限;檢查該程式碼的立即呼叫端從開始，然後進行堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫堆疊通常會表示向下成長，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫的方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> succeeds only if no <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> 只有當沒有成功<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>，就會引發。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have the permission specified by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端，不需要獲得目前執行個體所指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A caller higher in the call stack has called <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" /> on the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端已呼叫目前權限物件上的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot override this method.
trans-unit.target: 您無法覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Prevents callers higher in the call stack from using the code that calls this method to access the resource specified by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 防止呼叫堆疊中較高的呼叫端，使用程式碼呼叫此方法來存取目前執行個體所指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> method should be used only to protect resources from accidental access by fully trusted code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>方法應該只能用來保護資源的意外存取完全信任的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It should not be used to protect resources from intentional misuse by untrusted code.
trans-unit.target: 它不應要保護資源的刻意誤用，而不受信任的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, if method `A` issues a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> for a permission and then calls method `B`, method `B` can overtly override the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> by issuing an <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果方法`A`問題<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>的權限，然後呼叫方法`B`，方法`B`overtly 可以覆寫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>發出<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The called method is always higher in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 所呼叫的方法一律是在堆疊中較高。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if method `B` tries to access a protected resource, the security system begins checking for permissions with it because method `B` is the immediate caller, and then walks down the stack to confirm that there is no <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> or <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> lower in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果方法`B`嘗試存取受保護的資源時，安全性系統會開始檢查它的權限，因為方法`B`是立即呼叫端，上下然後查核行程的堆疊可以確認是否有任何<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>或<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>堆疊中較低。

trans-unit.source: Method `B`, which is trying to access the resource, can stop the stack walk immediately by using the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 方法`B`，這嘗試存取資源，可以堆疊查核行程立即停止使用<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> placed on the stack by method `A` (the calling method) is never discovered.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>放置在堆疊上方法`A`永遠不會探索 （呼叫的方法）。

trans-unit.source: This method prevents callers higher in the call stack from accessing the protected resource through the code that calls this method, even if those callers have been granted permission to access it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會防止呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端程式碼呼叫此方法，透過存取受保護的資源，即使這些呼叫端必須被授與存取權限。

trans-unit.source: The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫堆疊通常會表示向下成長，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫的方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> can limit the liability of the programmer or help prevent accidental security issues because it helps prevent the method that calls <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> from being used to access the resource protected by the denied permission.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> 可以限制程式設計人員的責任或協助防止意外安全性問題，因為它可協助避免呼叫此方法<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>從用來存取拒絕的權限所保護的資源。

trans-unit.source: If a method calls <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> on a permission, and if a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> for that permission is invoked by a caller lower in the call stack, that security check will fail when it reaches the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>權限，而且如果<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>到達時，該安全性檢查的呼叫堆疊中較低的呼叫端所叫用該權限時，將會失敗<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> is effective until the calling code returns to its caller.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>呼叫程式碼會傳回其呼叫端才會生效。

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> can be active on a frame.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>作用中的框架。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> when an active <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> exists on the frame results in a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>時作用中<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>上的框架會導致有<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertDeny%2A> or <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A> to remove an active <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertDeny%2A>或<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A>移除作用中<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> 會忽略該權限的要求將會失敗，因為未授與的權限。

trans-unit.source: There is already an active <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" /> for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 目前的框架已有作用中的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot override this method.
trans-unit.target: 您無法覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> 物件是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> 物件等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" />，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，透過 XML 編碼方式，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.ToXml%2A> and <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.FromXml%2A> methods to make the objects security-encodable.
trans-unit.target: 擴充安全性物件的自訂程式碼必須實作<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.ToXml%2A>和<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.FromXml%2A>方法，以使安全性 encodable 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an override of the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.FromXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的覆寫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.FromXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="elem" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elem" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="elem" /> parameter does not contain the XML encoding for an instance of the same type as the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elem" /> 參數不包含與目前執行個體相同型別的執行個體的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The version number of the <paramref name="elem" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="elem" /> 參數的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> 物件的雜湊碼，其適合用於雜湊表這類的雜湊演算法和資料結構。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission" /> 物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> objects.
trans-unit.target: 相同的權限的兩個執行個體的雜湊程式碼可能會不同，因此雜湊程式碼不應比較兩個<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>物件。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a derived class, creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別實作時，建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an override of the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的覆寫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，並且不是與目前使用權限相同類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a derived class, determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別實作時，會判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前權限會指定一組完全包含所指定的權限的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\.
trans-unit.target: 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是到 c： 代表存取權限的子集\\。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: The following statements are required to be `true` for all overrides of the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列陳述式必須是`true`所有覆寫的<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: *X*, *Y*, and *Z* represent custom code access permission objects that are not null references, *U* represents an unrestricted code access permission, and *N* represents an empty permission with a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None>.
trans-unit.target: *X*， *Y*，和*Z*代表不是 null 參考，自訂程式碼存取權限物件*U*表示無限制的程式碼存取權限和*N*表示空的權限和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None>。

trans-unit.source: *X*.IsSubsetOf(*X*) returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: *X*。IsSubsetOf (*X*) 傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: *X*.IsSubsetOf(*Y*) returns the same value as *Y*.IsSubsetOf(*X*) if and only if *X* and *Y* represent the same set of permissions.
trans-unit.target: *X*。IsSubsetOf (*Y*) 傳回相同的值做為*Y*。IsSubsetOf (*X*) 如果且只有*X*和*Y*代表相同的權限集。

trans-unit.source: If *X*.IsSubsetOf(*Y*) and *Y*.IsSubsetOf(*Z*) both return `true`, *X*.IsSubsetOf(*Z*) returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果*X*。IsSubsetOf (*Y*) 和*Y*。IsSubsetOf (*Z*) 都會傳回`true`， *X*。IsSubsetOf (*Z*) 傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: *X*.IsSubsetOf(*U*) returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: *X*。IsSubsetOf (*U*) 傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: *X*.IsSubsetOf(*N*) returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: *X*。IsSubsetOf (*N*) 傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: *N*.IsSubsetOf(*X*) returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: *N*。IsSubsetOf (*X*) 傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If *X* and *Y* represent custom code access permission objects that are null references, *X*.IsSubsetOf(*Y*) returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果*X*和*Y*代表自訂程式碼存取權限物件是 null 參考， *X*。IsSubsetOf (*Y*) 傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If *Z* is also null, the compound set operation *X*.Union(*Y*).IsSubsetOf(*Z*) also returns `true` because the union of two null permissions is a null permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果*Z*也是 null，複合設定作業*X*。等位 (*Y*)。IsSubsetOf (*Z*) 也會傳回`true`因為兩個 null 的權限的聯集為 null 的權限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an override of the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的覆寫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: Prevents callers higher in the call stack from using the code that calls this method to access all resources except for the resource specified by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 防止呼叫堆疊中較高的呼叫端，使用程式碼呼叫此方法來存取目前執行個體所指定之資源以外的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> method should be used only to protect resources from accidental access by fully trusted code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>方法應該只能用來保護資源的意外存取完全信任的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It should not be used to protect resources from intentional misuse by untrusted code.
trans-unit.target: 它不應要保護資源的刻意誤用，而不受信任的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, if method `A` issues a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> for a permission and then calls method `B`, method `B` can overtly override the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> by issuing an <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果方法`A`問題<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>的權限，然後呼叫方法`B`，方法`B`overtly 可以覆寫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>發出<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The called method is always higher in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 所呼叫的方法一律是在堆疊中較高。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if method `B` tries to access a protected resource, the security system begins checking for permissions with it because method `B` is the immediate caller, and then walks down the stack to confirm that there is no <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> or <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> lower in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果方法`B`嘗試存取受保護的資源時，安全性系統會開始檢查它的權限，因為方法`B`是立即呼叫端，上下然後查核行程的堆疊可以確認是否有任何<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>或<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>堆疊中較低。

trans-unit.source: Method `B`, which is trying to access the resource, can stop the stack walk immediately by using the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 方法`B`，這嘗試存取資源，可以堆疊查核行程立即停止使用<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> placed on the stack by method `A` (the calling method) is never discovered.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>放置在堆疊上方法`A`永遠不會探索 （呼叫的方法）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> is similar to <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>, in that both cause stack walks to fail when they would otherwise succeed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> 類似於<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>，在於兩者會導致堆疊查核行程符合則成功時失敗。

trans-unit.source: The difference is that <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> specifies permissions that will cause the stack walk to fail, but <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> specifies the only permissions that do not cause the stack walk to fail.
trans-unit.target: 其差異在於，<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>指定權限，會導致堆疊查核行程失敗，但<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>指定不會導致堆疊查核行程失敗的唯一權限。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to ensure that your code can be used to access only the specified resources.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法，以確保您的程式碼，可用來存取指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> is effective until the calling code returns to its caller.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>呼叫程式碼會傳回其呼叫端才會生效。

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> can be active on a frame.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>作用中的框架。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> when an active <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> exists on the frame results in a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>時作用中<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>上的框架會導致有<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertPermitOnly%2A> or <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A> to remove an active <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertPermitOnly%2A>或<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A>移除作用中<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> 會忽略該權限的要求將會失敗，因為未授與的權限。

trans-unit.source: However, if code lower on the call stack later calls <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> for that permission, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果程式碼呼叫較低堆疊稍後呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>該權限，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>堆疊查核行程到達嘗試呼叫的程式碼時，會擲回<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is because the code that called <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> has not been granted the permission, even though it called <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> for that permission.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為程式碼呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>未被授與權限，即使它呼叫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>該權限。

trans-unit.source: The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫堆疊通常會表示向下成長，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫的方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。

trans-unit.source: There is already an active <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly" /> for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 目前的框架已有作用中的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot override this method.
trans-unit.target: 您無法覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Causes all previous overrides for the current frame to be removed and no longer in effect.
trans-unit.target: 會移除目前畫面格之所有先前覆寫，且不再有作用。

trans-unit.source: If there are no overrides (<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>, <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>, or <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>) for the current frame, an <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何覆寫 (<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>， <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>，或<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>) 目前的框架，<xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: There is no previous <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" />, <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" />, or <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly" /> for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 沒有目前框架先前的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" />、<see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Causes any previous <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" /> for the current frame to be removed and no longer in effect.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前框架任何先前的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" /> 將移除並且不再有效。

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> for the current frame, an <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>目前的框架，<xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: There is no previous <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" /> for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 沒有目前框架先前的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert" />。

trans-unit.source: Causes any previous <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" /> for the current frame to be removed and no longer in effect.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前框架任何先前的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" /> 將移除並且不再有效。

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> for the current frame, an <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>目前的框架，<xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: There is no previous <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" /> for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 沒有目前框架先前的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny" />。

trans-unit.source: Causes any previous <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly" /> for the current frame to be removed and no longer in effect.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前框架任何先前的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly" /> 將移除並且不再有效。

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A> for the current frame, an <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly%2A>目前的框架，<xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: There is no previous <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly" /> for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 沒有目前框架先前的 <see cref="M:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.PermitOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 目前權限物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful in debugging when you need to display the permission as a string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是用於偵錯時您需要以字串形式顯示權限。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立安全性物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.ToXml%2A> and <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.FromXml%2A> methods to make the objects security-encodable.
trans-unit.target: 擴充安全性物件的自訂程式碼必須實作<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.ToXml%2A>和<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.FromXml%2A>方法，以使安全性 encodable 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an override of the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.ToXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的覆寫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.ToXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫的結果<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union%2A>是權限，表示代表的所有作業目前的權限和指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an override of the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的覆寫<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="other" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="other" /> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is only supported at this level when passed <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 當傳遞 <see langword="null" /> 這個方法只在這個層級受到支援。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: You should return a copy of the permission if the value of the <paramref name="other" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應傳回一份權限的值<paramref name="other" />參數是<see langword="null" />。
